ooC: I'm just going to jump in with Megatron sitting in the command 
chair of the base. DUnno what happened after i left, but I'll find 
out eventually. =P
NOTE: That poll about the constantly updated events thingy, is 
refering to the above problem: not knowing what has happened after a 
leave of absense. =)

-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron's clawed fingers tap the arm of his command chair as 
Switchblade fills him in on the status of the engine room.

"So you have reduced the engine room to usable parts. Good. 
Transform that room into a repair/lab center," says Megatron, his 
voice unreadable, "You can probably make use of the parts that were 
salvaged."

Switchblade nods, his indifferent experssion suggests that me might 
be hiding something, "As you wish Megs, I'll go and finish the 
modifications." Switchblade leaves and heads back to the engine room.

Megatron opens a commlink, "Nemesis Enforcer, Perceptor, status 
reports, now. Have any of the patrols returned yet?"
